description:
A xor-sum of a sequence of integers a1,a2,a3….am  is defined as the bitwise XOR of all its elements : a1^a2^a3….^am .
Here ^ denotes the bitwise XOR operation

You can take no more than k distinct integers from positive integer from 1 to n. Find the largest xor-sum (largest xor-sum means maximum happiness!) you can obtain..


#### `Input:1`

- `The two integers n and k (1≤k≤n≤10^18).`



#### `Output:`

- `Output one number - the largest possible xor-sum.`



#### `Sample 1`

#### `Input :`
`4 3`

#### `Output :`
`7`



#### `Sample 2`

#### `Input :`
`6 6`

#### `Output :`
`7`
title: XOR SUM
